name: 21 Inch Carry On Luggage, ABS Hardside Suitcase with Spinner Wheels, Airline-Approved Cabin Luggage with TSA Security Lock, Expandable Travel Suitcase for Flights, Business Trips & Weekend Vacations
short_description: Carry On Luggage for Airline-Approved Travel – This 21-inch small luggage is designed for seamless cabin use, crafted with a durable ABS hard shell and a refined, textured scratch-resistant finish. Its compact profile fits most overhead bins, making it an ideal airline-approved suitcase for business trips, weekend escapes, and fast and efficient travel through busy terminals.

Smooth Spinner Wheels for Effortless Transport – Experience smooth and quiet mobility with 360° spinner wheels, perfect for airports, hotels, and busy streets. Whether used as carry-on luggage or checked luggage, this travel suitcase glides easily in any direction, making business trips and vacations stress-free. From the compact 20-inch cabin suitcase to the full luggage set, each case ensures effortless maneuvering for travelers who value speed, convenience, and mobility.

Maximum Packing Capacity with Expandable Design – The expandable structure offers thoughtful additional space for extended stays, family travel, and seasonal packing. Well-designed dual compartments, mesh dividers, and adjustable straps keep belongings impeccably organized. From the 20-inch carry-on to the 28-inch checked suitcase, each piece delivers adaptable storage designed for modern business, leisure, and international travel.

Durable ABS Hard Shell Built for Any Trip – Built with a lightweight yet impact-resistant ABS hard shell, this hardside luggage withstands bumps, drops, and rough airport handling. Its lightweight design makes lifting into overhead compartments or onto conveyor belts easier, while the reinforced aluminum telescopic handle adds strength for frequent flyers, heavy packers, business travelers, and international trips.

TSA-Approved Lock for Enhanced Luggage Security – TSA-approved locks ensure your belongings arrive safely at your destination while allowing quick inspections. This airline-approved carry-on ensures smoother airport screening and safer travel for domestic flights, business trips, cross-country travel, and international vacations. The default lock code is set to 0-0-0.

name: Traveler's Choice Pagosa Indestructible Hardshell Expandable Spinner Luggage, Slate Blue, 22-Inch Carry-on
short_description: Impact Resistant: Indestructible polypropylene hardshell that’s abrasion-, scratch-, and water-resistant. Expansion gusset provide up to 2" to make packing effortless.
Smooth & Silent: Spinner wheels offer 360° rolling maneuverability, allowing you to glide smoothly through crowds and busy airports with ease.

Easy Maneuverability: Navigate with ease using the multi-stage telescopic handle with a push-button lock for adjustable height and smooth control. Top, side, and bottom rubber carry handles ensure effortless lifting and carrying from any angle.
Travel Sentry TSA Combo Lock: Provides enhanced security by safeguarding your belongings while allowing TSA agents to inspect your luggage without causing damage.

Space-Saving Interior: Maximize packing efficiency with a spacious main compartment featuring a zippered middle divider and multiple zippered pockets for organized storage. Durable self-mending #10 zippers ensure long-lasting reliability.
product_description: Travel with confidence and durability with the Traveler's Choice Pagosa Luggage. Crafted with a textured polypropylene hardshell, this set is abrasion-, scratch-, and water-resistant—perfect for withstanding the demands of any journey. The 360° spinner wheels ensure smooth and effortless mobility through crowded terminals, while the multi-stage telescoping handle with a push-button lock allows for easy height adjustment and maneuverability. Conveniently charge while you're on the go with an iTravel charging port (carry-on only, powerbank not included). Each piece includes an expansion gusset that offers up to 2 inches of additional packing capacity. Top and side rubber carry handles make lifting a breeze. Inside, you'll find a spacious main compartment with multiple zippered pockets and interior compression straps to keep belongings neatly secured. Finished with durable self-mending #10 zippers, the Pagosa set is designed to last, trip after trip.

name: Travelpro Crew Classic Lightweight Softside Expandable Carry on Luggage, 8 Wheel Spinner Suitcase, Men and Women, Carry On 21-Inch, Black
short_description: PRECISIONGLIDE MOBILITY SYSTEM: Eight ultra-durable 360° MagnaTrac spinner wheels and a patented PowerScope aluminum handle minimize wobble for effortless control. Handle adjusts to 36", 38", 40", and 42.5" with an ergonomic Contour Grip.

SMART PACKING ORGANIZATION: Removable compression packing organizer secures contents, maximizes space, compresses clothing, and doubles as a divider in the main compartment for efficient, customizable packing.

ECO-FRIENDLY, WATER-RESISTANT INTERIOR: ECOFAB lining with H2O Guard is made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles (8.5 bottles total), helping reduce environmental waste while protecting belongings.

DURABLE INTERIOR & EXPANSION: Interior hold-down straps, water-resistant storage, and multiple pockets keep items organized. Softside tapered expansion adds up to 2" of capacity while reducing tipping; DuraGuard fabric resists stains and abrasion.

CARRY-ON SIZE & TRUSTED COVERAGE: Case: 20.5" x 13.75" x 9". Overall ( includes wheels & carry handles): 23" x 14.5" x 9.5". Weight: 7 lbs. Volume: 47L. Includes Limited Lifetime Coverage and 3-year airline damage repair (registration required).
product_description: Travelpro is the brand of choice carried by crews from more than 90 worldwide airlines. Our extensive insider knowledge of the functionality and resilience needed by today’s aviation professionals provided inspiration when designing the new Crew Classic assortment specifically for the passenger who appreciates organized packing.Travel well and often with a spinner built for ultimate dependability, mile after mile. The Crew Classic Carry-on Expandable Spinner is lightweight yet exceptionally durable with upgraded organization for ultimate convenience Perfect for business or leisure travel, this full-size carry-on is great for short and medium-length trips with a tip-resistant zippered expansion option to increase packing space when needed. Pack more while staying organized with the removable compression packing organizer, which can also be used as a divider to separate contents in the main compartment. Interior hold-down straps, water-resistant storage, and multiple accessory pockets keep everything where it belongs and easy to find.This spinner’s PrecisionGlide System ensures precise control and effortless roll on eight ultra-durable, 360° MagnaTrac self-aligning spinner wheels led by a four-stop, height-adjustable PowerScope Handle with comfortable Contour Grip. Backed by a Built For a Lifetime Limited Warranty with our 3 Year Trusted Companion Promise, which covers damage caused by an airline or other common carrier.

short_description: The Perfect Size: The textured, scratch-resistant exterior of this hardshell carry-on luggage is 23in x 15in x 10in (with wheels) and meets the cabin size restrictions of most airlines.

Stay Organized: This small hard-sided carry-on suitcase provides ample packing room with a spacious 20.5" x 14.5" x 10.0" interior. The elastic straps, divider, and pouch ensure everything stays neatly in place.

Effortless Travel: Glide through airports easily with our smooth rolling, hardside carry-on luggage. With four oversized, multidirectional spinner wheels and a 6.5 lbs lightweight hard case, the suitcase moves effortlessly in all directions.
Peace of Mind: Set your combination easily with the built-in TSA-approved lock—no keys needed. It ensures the belongings in your carry-on luggage stay safe and sound throughout your journey.

Built to Last, Guaranteed: Trust in our durable hard-shell carry-on luggage with a 10-year warranty backed by rigorous testing. Samsonite ensures that our hard-shell suitcases remain reliable as you travel.
product_description: The Samsonite Freeform Carry-On Luggage is a meticulously engineered suitcase designed to optimize the modern traveler's journey. Crafted with precision, this carry-on luggage with wheels epitomizes sophistication and functionality, catering to those seeking effortless travel experiences. A 21-inch spacious interior makes it convenient and practical for packing. At the same time, it is compliant with most carry-on size restrictions for international and domestic travel. With exterior dimensions of 21.25" x 15.25" x 10.0" including the wheels, this carry-on luggage is airline-approved for cabin use. Our hard case suitcase with wheels facilitates fluid movement through bustling concourses and urban environments thanks to four multi-directional oversized dual-spinner wheels. The re-engineered lightweight construction further enhances effortless mobility.

short_description: 【SAVE $60-$80 PER FLIGHT CARRY ON CHARGES 】 –– Our Suitcase Size 18 x 14 x 8 inch, perfect fit personal item size 18 x 14 x 8 inch limit of Spirit and Frontier. It can be easily placed under seat to save your carry on charge around $60-$80 per flight.
